outline:
1. to pass over, spring over
    1. (Qal) to pass over
    2. (Piel) to skip, pass over
  2. to limp
    1. (Qal) to limp
    2. (Niphal) to be lame
    3. (Piel) to limp
kjv_def: halt, become lame, leap, pass over.
strongs_def: to hop, i.e. (figuratively) skip over (or spare); by implication, to hesitate; also (literally) to limp, to dance
